metadata.name: Xenomorphs cell : threose
metadata.description:
My “ Xenomorphs cell ” project consists of 4 NFTs with video and music , correlated by the most recent and innovative scientific discoveries in xenobiology and advanced research in biotechnology, with the creation of xeno-DNA with structural chemical changes relative to its natural counterparts using Glycol , Hexose and Threose . 

XNA ( Xeno-DNA)  can carry new and alien genetic information as human DNA creating a new new genetic systems for synthetic life ( xeno organism )

In the fourth NFT "Xenomorphs cell : threose " I imagined  XNA with structural chemical changes using  Glycol , creating life xeno cell during meiosis phase of replication. 

Music for : Vcs 3 , Buchla , Granular Synthesis and voice

For scientific information and bibliography on Xeno genetic research please visit [Xeno Genetic Research Centre](https://sites.google.com/view/roberto-musci-xenobiology/xenobiology)

For music information on Xenomorphs cells project [music](https://sites.google.com/view/robertomusci)
